explanation: [0-0] Against a white background, a man wearing a white shirt with a white towel wrapped around his head, opens his mouth wide and closes his eyes tightly.
[0-2] He holds a potato chip in one hand, brings it to his open mouth, and looks down with his eyes wide open.
[0-2] He holds a potato chip in one hand, brings it to his open mouth, and looks down with his eyes wide open.

[2-6] Next, the scene switches to a man in a blue shirt and a headband with a dinosaur print, lying on a rattan chair. He holds a potato chip in his hand, opens his mouth, and has a small teddy bear beside his head. As he chews a few times, his body suddenly lifts upward. He opens his mouth wide, smiles, and lies back down. He continues to chew with his mouth again.
